info.author: Morty
info.name: Elektro Power Save
info.description: The Elektro Power Save plugin puts the box from standby to sleep mode (Deep Standby) at certain times.\n This only happens if the box is in standby and no recording is running or sheduled in the next 20 minutes.\n The box automatically wakes up for recordings or at the end of the sleep time. You therefore don't have to wait until it is on again.
